The tree may not be strong enough to support the weight of the tree house, leading to damage to the tree or even collapse of the tree house.
The location of the tree house may not be safe or easily accessible, leading to difficulties in building and using the tree house.
The materials used in building the tree house may not be of high quality, leading to problems with durability and safety.
The design of the tree house may not be functional or practical, leading to difficulties in using and enjoying the tree house.
The cost of building a tree house may be prohibitive, making it difficult for some people to afford to build one.
